name: monero-zk-payment
description: ZK-proof that a Monero payment happened - wallet-agnostic, multi-field copy, browser → zk-SNARK → Solana/EVM

scripts.build: npm run build-circuits && npm run build-client
scripts.build-circuits: circom circuits/monero_payment.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym && snarkjs groth16 setup monero_payment.r1cs pot12_final.ptau monero_payment.pk && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey monero_payment.pk monero_payment.vk
scripts.setup: npm run download-powers-of-tau && npm run build
scripts.download-powers-of-tau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
